programme.title: Live International T20 Cricket
programme.desc: New Zealand v West Indies. Coverage of the fifth and final match of the series, held at University Oval in Dunedin. New Zealand have played T20s here on four previous occasions and boast a 100 per cent record, having twice defeated Pakistan since victories over Australia and Pakistan. The visitors have won just two of their last 10 T20's against their hosts since July 2014.
